notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: A.V.-R., A.-B.F., G.G. and A.R.M. conceived the study. A.V.-R. and A.-B.F. designed and performed the competence studies. Y.M. analysed the competence data in relation to the ancestry of the population samples and contributed to the results and discussion. Mo.M., Mi.M., L.M.G. and D.C. collected and analysed the population genetics data. L.M.G. edited the paper and prepared figures. A.R.M. wrote the paper with input from A.V.-R., A.-B.F., Y.M., G.G. and L.M.G. All authors gave final approval for publication.
